hero.description: I unify <1>Marketing</1>, <3>Product</3>, and <5>Technology</5>. I build scalable solutions in Web3, Gaming, and Streaming from strategy to automation.

about.quote_start: I don't choose between creativity and technique;
about.description: I am a Digital Ecosystem Architect combining the strategic vision of a CMO with the technical execution of a Developer. My approach is not just building software or launching campaigns, but creating integral systems where Marketing fuels Product and Technology scales the Business.

betbits.description: Leading marketing strategy for a crypto casino while building internal AI infrastructure.

achievements.1: Developed 'Performance Hub': App that crosses Meta Ads and GA4 data for real-time ROAS analysis
achievements.2: Built 'SEO Planner + Generator': Automation of content clusters and generation of optimized articles
achievements.3: Created 'Help Center AI': Assistant that analyzes user sentiment and drafts support tickets
achievements.4: Consolidated a 'performance-first' culture, moving from manual processes to AI-assisted flows

mixon.description: Design, construction, and integral operation of a digital native streaming media from scratch.

achievements.1: General & Technical Live Production: Led the full studio setup, talent recruitment, and daily technical operation (Camera Director/Switching) of 4 hours of live programming
achievements.2: Massive Event Orchestration: General Producer of 'The Fight of the Year', coordinating 14 influencers and achieving 100k concurrent viewers and +20 Million total views on social media
achievements.3: Viral Content Strategy: Executed vertical clip strategy (editing & distribution), organically scaling communities to +130k combined followers (80k TikTok, 60k IG) without ad spend
achievements.4: Team Leadership: Team building and management. Created programming grid from scratch

coinary.role: Head of Marketing and Web Developer
coinary.description: Led the integral growth of the Web3 gaming ecosystem: from web development to community management.

achievements.1: Executed IGO with Binance ($1M USD raised)
achievements.2: Development of the official Coinary ecosystem website
achievements.3: In charge of SEO and organic positioning
achievements.4: Community Manager on Telegram and all game social networks
achievements.5: Social Media Manager for Coinary across all platforms

coinarytv.description: My first work experience. General Producer of the YouTube channel and Coinary.TV blogs.

achievements.2: YouTube Manager: content strategy and optimization
achievements.4: Community Manager handling the channel's Instagram

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Systems deployed in production. Real results.

pelea.title: The Fight of the Year
pelea.subtitle: General Production & Streaming
pelea.description: Complete orchestration of the city's largest streaming event.
pelea.challenge: The biggest challenge was High-Profile Talent Management (coordination and logistics of 14 content creators for 7 boxing matches) and coordinating a low-latency broadcast for 100k concurrent viewers.
pelea.solution: Integral Showrunning: Creation of technical script (Run of Show), timelines, and minute-by-minute live broadcast supervision. Implemented a hybrid network architecture with 5G redundancy and designed a physical 'Social Hub' to synchronize hype.
pelea.result: Massive Impact: Responsible for the distribution strategy that generated +20 Million short-form views and retained 100k live viewers. Broke national viewership records for an event of this type.

binance.title: Binance IGO
binance.subtitle: Web3 Growth & Launchpad
binance.description: Execution of global campaign for token and NFT launch in a high-volatility market.
binance.challenge: Launching an Initial Game Offering (IGO) during a period of high market saturation, where user trust was low and traditional advertising platforms (Meta/Google) constantly blocked crypto ads.
binance.solution: Developed a 'Guerrilla Growth' strategy. Used niche influencers in Tier 2 and 3 regions (SEA/LATAM) and built a gamified reward system on Discord. For Paid Media, used educational 'bridge' landing pages to pass ad approval filters.
binance.result: Achieved Sold Out in minutes on Binance platform. Discord community grew to 50k real active members (no bots) and Cost Per Acquisition (CPA) was reduced by 60% compared to industry benchmark.

betbits.title: Automations for Betbits
betbits.subtitle: AI Automation Ecosystem
betbits.description: Solution to data analysis and SEO bottlenecks using AI agents.
betbits.challenge: The marketing team was losing 15 hours a week analyzing GA4 reports and writing basic SEO articles to maintain organic traffic, limiting time for creative strategy.
betbits.solution: Created an automation pipeline using n8n and the Gemini API. 1) One agent reads GA4 data and generates a daily executive summary in Slack. 2) Another agent takes search trends and writes optimized SEO drafts requiring only human review.
betbits.result: Eliminated 40% of manual operational load. SEO content production tripled without hiring extra staff, and the team could focus on conversion optimization, increasing global ROI.

youtube.title: YouTube Management
youtube.subtitle: Channel Scaling & Content Strategy
youtube.description: Integral management of video-first ecosystems. From high-CTR thumbnail conceptualization to executive production of content for massive channels like CoinaryTV.
youtube.challenge: Achieving visual consistency and quality in a high-frequency publishing environment, maintaining audience retention in competitive niches.
youtube.solution: Implemented chain production processes (Factory Model) for thumbnails and editing. Optimized titles and metadata based on real-time trend analysis.
youtube.result: Sustained growth of the main channel to over 200,000 subscribers. Establishment of a solid and recognizable visual identity on the platform.

social.title: Social Media Growth
social.subtitle: Multi-Platform Community Architecture
social.description: Orchestration of unified digital presence for Coinary, Mix On, and Betbits across Instagram, TikTok, Twitter, Telegram, and Discord.
social.challenge: Maintaining a coherent brand voice adapted to each platform (e.g., formality on LinkedIn vs. virality on TikTok) and managing active communities in real-time.
social.solution: Developed scalable community management systems using moderation bots and recyclable content flows to maximize reach with optimized resources.
social.result: Vibrant and safe communities on Discord and Telegram. Organic social media growth through native content strategies for each platform.
